This source was developed from v2.0 of Capture-BAT, and is GPL software (see COPYING). 
The source for this modified version of Capture-BAT is available at:
http://www.honeyclient.org/trac/browser/capture-mod/trunk
and can be checked out by doing
svn co svn://svn.honeyclient.org/capture-mod/trunk capture-mod

From the original ReadMe-BAT.txt
Please refer to http://www.nz-honeynet.org/capture-standalone.html for more information on installation, usage, etc.
